entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
